title: The Olivia Tremor Control
description:
These are two studio albums by the incredible Athens band The Olivia Tremor Control: Music from the Unrealized Film Script: Dusk at Cubist Castle (1996) and Black Foliage: Animation Music Volume One (1999). These are the first releases and not the reissues.

The files were ripped from CD to FLAC. 

Good album reviews cand be found here: <a href="
http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/5983-dusk-at-cubist-castle/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/5983-dusk-at-cubist-castle/</a> <a href="
http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/5982-black-foliage-animation-music-vol-1/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/5982-black-foliage-animation-music-vol-1/</a>
